name: Witty Demon

rulings.text: The minimum deck size is normally 40 cards in a Limited event and 60 cards in a Constructed event.
“Starting library” should be interpreted as “starting deck,” including cards that started the game in a zone other than your library (such as Buried Ogre or Memory Bank).

text:
Flying
When Witty Demon enters the battlefield, if your starting library had at least 13 cards over the minimum, search your library for a card and put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library. Otherwise, Witty Demon deals 4 damage to you.
